lines.text: WISDOM HALL OF FAME
for Eminent Recipients of the Wisdom Award Of Honor
and Notable Founders of the Wisdom Encyclopedia
General Dwight D. Eisenhower and Nehru of India, two of the most
admired world leaders of all time. Both great men are enshrined in
the Wisdom Hall Of Fame, and are Eminent Recipients of the Wisdom
Award Of Honor and Notable Founders of The Wisdom Encyclopedia.
The Wisdom Hall Of Fame was created by The Wisdom Society For The Advancement Of
Knowledge, Learning And Research In Education. It was established to honor and pay tribute to
outstanding people of our time, eminent in all the worthwhile activities of American life. In the
Wisdom Hall Of Fame are inscribed the names of distinguished, admired, and illustrious individuals
who best symbolize wisdom in every profession and meritorius field of human endeavor. They
are people of wisdom, endowed with superior intelligence, noted for their worthwhile achieve-
ments, high character, respected reputations and intellectual accomplishments. They have encour-
aged intellectual and cultural achievement. They have made permanent constructive contributions
to American life and rendered valuable service to our nation, thereby contributing to the welfare
of all mankind. They are persons of prestige whose lives stand as an inspiration to young Ameri-
cans, and whose achievements inspire young people to higher ambitions and greater attainments.
The Wisdom Award Of Honor is conferred upon those whose names are inscribed in the Wisdom
Hall Of Fame by The Wisdom Society: "In expression of its high esteem and in recognition of
distinguished achievement and notable contributions to knowledge and education; for devotion
to the cause of learning, and dedication to the noble ideals of wisdom; for achieving distinction
as wise human beings of intellectual ability, extraordinary accomplishments and humanitarian
LEON GUTTERMAN
idealism, thereby symbolizing the inspired qualities of wisdom; for significantly contributing to
the educational progress of our nation by exemplifying the highest tradition of American life."
The Wisdom Society For The Advancement Of Knowledge, Learning And Research In Education
is a non-profit educational publishing institution that has won world-wide renown and admiration through sheer merit of dis-
tinguished achievement and brilliant public service in the field of education. It is dedicated to the pursuit of wisdom and to the
highest aspirations of the human mind and spirit - without purpose of profit. It publishes Wisdom Magazine, Wisdom Books
and The Wisdom Encyclopedia. The primary objectives of The Wisdom Society are: 1. To contribute to the advancement of
the intellectual life of our nation by stimulating and encouraging the pursuit of learning and wisdom; 2. To cultivate in our
future citizens a deeper appreciation of the benefits which come to them from education and wisdom; 3. To communicate wis-
dom as well as to inspire the love of acquiring wisdom; 4. To ennoble and enrich the resources and capacities of the human
mind; 5. To contribute to the intellectual advancement of our beloved country and thereby to the enrichment of civilization.
LEON GUTTERMAN
President and Publisher
